dialogue.text: Welcome, everyone, to our first broadcast of SINGING DREAMS!
(Woaaah...what a beatiful stage)
(It's like I'm ACTUALLY there!)
(..Wait a minute)
I'm Raymond, your host! Any BOY do we have some surprises in store for you tonight.
That first surprise being, WE HAVE NO STAFF!
We had a little incident with our food delivery...
...Now the whole crew and guest stars are puking endlessly!
Except for our cameraman, Lottie…
(Haha, that’s actually…not good…)
Lottie, don’t wave, no one can see you. Sheesh...
Anyway, we have a change of plans. Behold!
A new singer to compensate for my staff's incompetence!
Please welcome our (totally legitimate) guest star...
...Whoever this green alien is!
(I wish I hadn’t eaten that pot pie.)
You are a quiet one, huh?
Relaaax, crisp! You'll be fine, what's the worst thing that could happen?
It isn’t like there are 40,000 people watching you, waiting for you to mess up so they can turn you into the laughingstock of the generation?
There are actually 50,000
(The audience counter is just an upside down calculator)
Lottie is trying but failing to get the number any higher than three...)
Just sing anything you like! Even if you suck, well...
...At least you get to be a pebble in my growing pathway to fame! What an honor, eh?
